title.narrative: MONITORING AND EVALUATION

description.narrative: The established systems for the production and updating of facts about the situation of women and children and the monitoring of action plans via the supervision of activities and attainment levels of the MDGs and of the Country Program and their results of impact, and formulated and implemented the supervision of the cost of the packages of interventions , which contributes to Building Capacity For Evaluation, Child Poverty / Public Finance For Children, Cross-Sectoral Early Childhood Development, Cross-Sectoral Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Cross-Sectoral Planning And Programme Reviews, Early Childhood Development, Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas, Unicef Capacity For Programming On Gender. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: The established systems for the production and updating of facts about the situation of women and children and the monitoring of action plans via the supervision of activities and attainment levels of the MDGs and of the Country Program and their results of impact, and formulated and implemented the supervision of the cost of the packages of interventions

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: The established systems for the production and updating of facts about the situation of women and children and the monitoring ofaction plans via the supervision of activities and attainment levels of the MDGs and of the Country Program and their results ofimpact, and formulated and implemented the supervision of the cost of the packages of interventions;
SITAN prepared and disseminated

baseline.value: Plan and model of the document prepared by the consultant and validity by the UNICEF office in the collection process performed support information

target.value: 2015:SITAN approved and disseminated as support for preparation of the new CPD

actual.value: 2015:The SITAN has been finalized, the printing and publishing is still pending.

title.narrative: SMR/CPD/CPMP and IMEP produced and approved

baseline.value: Plan and model of the document sent by the UNICEF / NY office started preparation process

target.value: 2015:Final version of the CPD document / CPMP and IMEP for the 2016-2020 period available, approved and disseminated

actual.value: 2015:All documents were produced and available. The final version end of CPD and its attachments outside approved last September.

title.narrative: Study, surveys and Evaluations Conducted and the reports produced and disseminated

baseline.value: Plan of studies, surveys and assessments for the year 2015 prepared and validated in IMEP and AMP

target.value: 2015:Studies, investigations and assessments carried out, report of each available, validated and disseminated

actual.value: 2015:Among the various studies scheduled in IMEP for 2015, the study on parental behavior programmed by the education section was carried out WCARO of experts and the English version of the report is available for validation as well as the anthropological study with regard to transmission and prevention

title.narrative: Guinea-BissauInfo site updated and disseminated

baseline.value: Site developed, approved and disseminated, with the MICS survey data, 2010

target.value: 2015:Site Base updated with new information and disseminated to all potential users

actual.value: 2015:The Data base Guinea-BissauInfo data has been updated with three data sources, ' MICS/2010 and 2014, SMART/2012` and disseminated on the web page of Guinea-BissauInfo. Internment in the country, the Web page was spread in universities (Lusophone, and Jean Piaget) as well as in the center of Administ

title.narrative: Guinea Bissau DevInfo Site operational

actual.value: 2015:The Data base Guinea-BissauInfo data has been updated with three data sources, ' MICS/2010 and 2014, SMART/2012` and disseminated on the web page of Guinea-BissauInfo. title.narrative: MICS survey Conducted and disseminated report

baseline.value: Training of field agents and data entry, collection, processing and production of statistical tables

target.value: 2015:MICS-5 completed, and the technical report on analysis of data validity and disseminated

actual.value: 2015:Regarding the MICS-5 survey, the preliminary report was produced, and disseminated as well as a summary sheet of the main results of the survey. The two documents relating to the MICS-5, served to support fund-raising during the round table organized by the Guinea-Bissau Government in Brussels as we

title.narrative: Government technicians in charge of M & E trained RBM/GAR

baseline.value: Training plan prepared and approved in collaboration with the coordination team of the UN System

target.value: 2015:Multiplication of training on the techniques of RBM / Gar at the level of regional offices of the ministries of social areas

actual.value: 2015:During the year 2015, they were trained in technical RBM 85 Technical Social Ministries (Health, Education, Water Resources, Justice, Poverty, Economies and Finance).
